components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Receipts Delays to Indosat Network in Indonesia

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery receipts delays to Indosat network in Indonesia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery receipts delays to Indosat network in Indonesia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to H3G networks, and have identified that the issue over the Indosat Network is only associated with Delivery Reports, while current delivery is accurate. Our engineers continue working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to H3G networks, and have identified that the issue over the Indosat Network is only associated with Delivery Reports, while current delivery is accurate. Our engineers continue working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to H3G networks, but delays are still occurring when sending to Indosat in Indonesia. Our engineers continue working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the Indosat and H3G networks in Indonesia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the Indosat and H3G networks in Indonesia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner AT&T in United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT until 14 April 2024 at 07:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for AT&T United States customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon and Yota

incident_updates.body: The Megafon and Yota network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 16 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Megafon and Yota Russia handsets.

The Vodafone network in Germany is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 April 2024 at 21:00 PDT until 16 April 2024 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Vodafone Germany handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 April 2024 at 21:00 PDT until 18 April 2024 at 01:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US handsets via US short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon and Yota

incident_updates.body: The Megafon and Yota network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 18 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Megafon and Yota Russia handsets.

Our SMS carrier partner in Spain is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 April 2024 at 21:00 PDT until 19 April 2024 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Spain handsets.

Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 May 07:00 until 10 May 14:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Singapore (SG1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls to and from Singapore.

Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 10 May 07:00 until 10 May 14:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Singapore (SG1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in SG1.

Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 11 May 09:00 until 11 May 14:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Singapore (SG1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls to and from Singapore.

Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 11 May 09:00 until 11 May 14:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Singapore (SG1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in SG1.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our Voice carrier partner in Germany and France is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 08 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 24 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures to Twilio Germany mobile and landline phone numbers, and from and to France toll free, mobile and landline phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

08 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 08 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
10 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 10 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
15 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 15 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
17 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 17 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
22 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 22 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
24 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 24 April 2024 at 19:00 PDT
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

01 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 01 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT
